review: I wish I had ordered it months ago.  Excellent
author: James P Murphy

review: Not a seashell..... Roku still best! This is a close second! We use both. Better if you have Amazon.... We don't at present.
author: Gary R. Ballard

review: Works great for me. Amazing and inexpensive alternative to cable.
author: Amazon Customer

review: Works great and easy to set up. Superior to Chromecast.
author: Michael Rosales

review: Was everything I thought it would be
author: Chauncey Whitford

review: Love it! Exceeded my expectations. Usually I read that something is really easy to set up and it's not. The Firestick is! We had a TV that was not "smart" and used rarely. Now it provides a great alternative. I had Netflix running in just a few minutes. It worked great!
author: sunbirdaz

review: really happy with the fire stick. It was really easy to set up almost plug and play. Would have received 5 stars if could use iPad and screen mirroring without purchasing a app.
author: kevin walter

review: This is working great for me. Like others, I had to go online to figure out how to get the battery door open, but after that, things were fine.
author: Sheila Noblitt

review: It was good but disappointed most things have additional charges.
author: Thomas Harden
